entry.title: Happy New Year 2021
entry.summary: So a New year, new challenges on their way. Covid-19 is still with us, so I just want to hope that you all…
entry.content: So a New year, new challenges on their way. Covid-19 is still with us, so I just want to hope that you all take the necessary precautions for your respective environments. Be Safe and Have Fun, As much as you can!

entry.title: Publii Impresses
entry.summary: Publii makes creating and deploying a static website, like a blog, a piece of cake. I am a software engineer and whenever…
entry.content:
Publii makes creating and deploying a static website, like a blog, a piece of cake. I am a software engineer and whenever I get caught up in creating a site for myself I get lost in frameworks and and themes, and Publii centralizes all those decisions while still giving me the flexibility to customize to an enormous degree! 

The pure simplicity to add a new post and deploy, has inspired me to actually start posting my thoughts...

entry.content:
Hi,

Welcome to this web page, I am Mark Ellul. I have set up this page in part for testing out Github Pages and the Publii Publishing tool
